sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"> <sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <child display_value="link-button1">8db907b42ff1b300a4a2c886f699b62b</child> <cloned>2019-05-31 13:13:53</cloned> <last_validated>2019-05-31 13:13:53</last_validated> <parent display_value="link-button">abc50de6d702120023c84f80de61036a</parent> <payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>standard</category><client_script/><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.btn { width: 100%; }</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data>{ "href": "www.google.com", "button_text": "Go to google" }</demo_data><description/><docs/><field_list>color</field_list><has_preview>true</has_preview><id>widget-link-button</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>link-button</name><option_schema>[{"name":"href","section":"Presentation","label":"Link for button","type":"string"},{"name":"button_text","section":"Presentation","label":"Contents of button","type":"string"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles>snc_external,snc_internal</roles><script><![CDATA[data.buttonMsg = gs.getMessage(options.button_text || "Click Here");]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-11 23:15:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>abc50de6d702120023c84f80de61036a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>link-button</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">4d90053365c22300aadb05e0fb3edf8a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_abc50de6d702120023c84f80de61036a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-11 18:13:53</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<a ng-href="{{options.href}}" class="btn btn-{{options.color}} m-b">{{data.buttonMsg}}</a>]]></template></sp_widget></payload> <sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-05-31 13:13:53</sys_created_on> <sys_id>45b907b42ff1b300a4a2c886f699b62e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>8db907b42ff1b300a4a2c886f699b62b</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="LMS" source="x_315700_lms">03ba89b6db003300c1e8f53a299619df</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="LMS">03ba89b6db003300c1e8f53a299619df</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_45b907b42ff1b300a4a2c886f699b62e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-05-31 13:13:53</sys_updated_on> </sp_rel_widget_clone> </record_update>
